title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 15 September 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (15/09/2008 04:30): XWiki.AtehBen was modified by XWiki.AtehBen (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/AtehBen  
asyd - (15/09/2008 10:21): hello there  
lucaa - (15/09/2008 10:32): hi xwikiers!  
lucaa - (15/09/2008 10:34): does anyone have any idea why object.property could return different from object.getProperty("property").value ? I should mention that it is a custom mapped class I am refering  
Denis - (15/09/2008 11:03): lucaa: are you talking about $obj.property is different than $obj.getProperty("property").value ?  
vmassol - (15/09/2008 11:18): lucaa: can we put bullets or something to spearate the different feeds on the home page of news.myxwiki.org. It's really hard to read now  
vmassol - (15/09/2008 11:18): (last flagged articles and last read articles)  
tmortagne - (15/09/2008 14:51): vmassol: do you see any entry point in core-rendering where I can cleanly register BeanUtils converter used in syntax parameters (FYI it's ColorConverter to use in table for now but I guess it can be used in others syntax or also in macros)  
vmassol - (15/09/2008 14:52): tmortagne: thinking...  
vmassol - (15/09/2008 14:54): I'm wondering if we need a xwiki-converter module...  
vmassol - (15/09/2008 14:54): might be a bit overkill I don't know  
tmortagne - (15/09/2008 14:55): vmassol: was thinking the same thing as BeanUtils is also used in core-configuration component  
tmortagne - (15/09/2008 14:55): and I guess ColorConverter and EnumConverter can be usefll here too  
vmassol - (15/09/2008 14:55): yes but it's not used for converting, it's used for filling a java beans  
vmassol - (15/09/2008 14:56): but we might need conversion later on yes  
vmassol\_ - (15/09/2008 14:58): this looks a bit dead: http://commons.apache.org/sandbox/convert/  
vmassol\_ - (15/09/2008 14:58): yes It's dead  
tmortagne - (15/09/2008 15:00): it's pretty much what ConvertUtils do so I guess it as been deprecated for that  
vmassol\_ - (15/09/2008 15:01): possibly yes  
vmassol\_ - (15/09/2008 15:02): tmortagne: in any case the idea is to wrap BeanUtils in a component and initialize it in initialize()  
tmortagne - (15/09/2008 15:03): yep

DSpair - (15/09/2008 20:05): Hey gang, need some help with rights on 1.5  
DSpair - (15/09/2008 20:06): I have a BBCode site enabled, and I want to give access to the RSS feeds for unauthenticated users, but everything I have tried fails.  
xwikibot - (15/09/2008 20:07): XWiki.maxelcat was modified by XWiki.maxelcat (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/maxelcat

DSpair - (15/09/2008 20:08): I gave view rights to Unregistered Users for BBCode/CategoryRSS, but unauthenticated users still cannot open the page.
